Instructions for the take-home group project part of the final is [here](take-home.html)

The final exam is [here](https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/courses/22992/files/folder/others?preview=8835262) and it has instructions on the first page. Note that you should be working on the final exam on your own.

Should you need a [cheatsheet](cheatsheet.pdf) it is provided. 

 
Note that the group project and the exam are equally weighted.
